document_data.name: ''Umberlee's Blessed Band''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Umberlee's blessed band''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[Umberlant]] [[ring]] forged sometime before [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Description: This ring was in a sea-side forge and called in the salty waters of [[Umberlee]]'s domain. The metal surface of the band was rippled with a pattern reminiscent waves in a sea.
document_data.Powers: When the wearer of ''Umberlee's blessed band'' touched the ring to their forehead and uttered the name of the Bitch Queen, a [[water elemental]] was summoned under the wearer's command. The effects of the ring were similar the ''[[summon water elemental]]'' spell and could be activated once per day.
document_data.History: In 1372 DR, ''Umberlee's blessed band'' was discovered in the stomach of a dead fish, washed ashore the [[Crab's Claw Coast]] region of the [[Sword Coast]]. How the band ended up inside a fish remained a mystery.
